ValidationRule.description: Requires Maintenance Interval for Hardware and Network Equipment categories
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Asset_Category__c, "Hardware"), ISPICKVAL(Asset_Category__c, "Network Equipment") ), ISPICKVAL(Lifecycle_Stage__c, "Active"), ISBLANK(Maintenance_Interval_Days__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Maintenance Interval is required for active Hardware and Network Equipment assets.
